corePackage.description: Centralized quality hub for reporting and smart integrations for all things Salesforce.
releaseNotes: Test Case Generation 2.0: Available in custom Provar Test Management tab with multi-format outputs (Text, Markdown, JSON, Gherkin, XML, Apex, Java), structured parsing, and selective save.
Batch Generation: Supports creating 1â€“10 test cases at a time for faster coverage.
Improved Prompting & Grounding: Enhanced system prompts with stronger context for reliable, consistent outputs.
Issue-Aware Generation: Auto-populates linked Issue, recommended field set, and default Intent name.
Scenario Quality Assistant: Provides strength indicators and AI 'Improve Scenario' workflow for refining scenarios.
Test Intent Capture: Records natural language description, intent name, persona, context objects, and issue.
Test Output Capture: Stores generated test cases for later reference and tracking.
Safer Downloads: Unified payload service, .feature conversion for Gherkin, fallback viewer, and improved file naming.
Lookup & Usability: Programmatic Issue preselection, consistent display labels, improved toasts and status messages.
Reliability & Bug Fixes: Fixed script error on download, removed phantom default steps, improved empty/None test data handling, and strengthened heuristics against repetition/padding.
Shield Compatibility: Resolved error when installing Provar Manager on Shield Encrypted Orgs.

plugins.description: Connect to your Jira org, import projects and issues into Provar Manager, relate test cases to issues, and export defects as bugs back into Jira.
releaseNotes: Patch Fix for JIRA API changes
Added one-shot JIRA project import feature
Implemented Import job completion notifications
Started initial phase of bi-directional sync from Provar Manager to JIRA
Delivered various bug fixes

plugins.description: Embed manual and automated testing into your release pipeline.
releaseNotes: DevOps engineers can leverage 2 new Quality Pipelines (i.e. flow templates) to automatically trigger the execution in Provar Grid of Provar test cases directly or indirectly related to a work item when its status changes to 'In Review'
Fixed package installation issue.

plugins.description: Embed manual and automated testing into your release pipeline.
releaseNotes: Users can sync test cases from Provar Manager to DevOps Testing and trigger tests to run in their DevOps Center pipelines.
Fixed dependencies for Salesforce DevOps Testing App to sync Provar Test Provider.
Updated Default Java Version for Grid Settings to 21.
Provar Manager users can leverage Agentforce to trigger the execution of tests (using test plan schedules).

plugins.description: Link Test Plans and Gearset CI Jobs to enable automated CI/CD with test automation embedded. Trigger and manage Gearset jobs from Provar Manager to streamline releases, increase test coverage, and improve delivery quality without leaving Salesforce.
releaseNotes: Trigger, Cancel, and Monitor Gearset Jobs from Provar Manager.
Link Gearset CI Jobs to Provar Test Plan Schedules for a fully automated DevOps Pipeline.
Gearset Job syncing for keeping Gearset CI Job history and Provar Manager job histories in sync.
Enhanced security for all SOQL/DML actions has been added.

plugins.description: Relate test cases to branches and see their execution status per environment from within the branch itself.
releaseNotes: Relate test cases to branches using Branch Test Case records.
Map PM system records to Flosum org records to show test executions on branch records.
Fixed vulnerabilities from code scan tools.

plugins.description: Relate test cases to user stories and see their execution status per environment from within the user story itself.
releaseNotes: Include flow templates to run test cases (via Apex or Provar Grid) related to user stories or their tracked metadata, when their status changes to 'Ready for testing'.

plugins.description: Connect to QualityClouds and retrieve code scans so they can be analysed in Provar Manager.
releaseNotes: Fix callout to QualityClouds API to retrieve code scans.

plugins.description: Connect to Clayton and retrieve code scans so they can be analysed in Provar Manager.
releaseNotes: Fix bug with handling of branch names.

plugins.description: Connect to your Azure DevOps org, import projects and work items into Provar Manager, relate test cases to work items, and export defects as bugs back into Azure DevOps.
releaseNotes: Connect Provar Manager to Azure DevOps.
Import projects with their work item types and work item relation types.
Import work items of any type.
Send bugs to Azure DevOps from the defect record and have it automatically linked to the related work item.
Bug Fixes and Improved Stability

plugins.description: Provar Automation is an end-to-end test automation solution built for Salesforce.
releaseNotes: Winter 26 Compatibility
CPQ v258 Winter 26 compatibility
Edge Chromium as Authoring Browser
Edge Options support for automation execution
Edge Driver auto-detect & auto-download (with manual override)
Chrome 137 extension policy update (one-time install from Web Store)
System environment variable support for connections
Security improvements with Eclipse & dependency upgrades (CVE fixes)

plugins.description: ProvarDX provides the capability to extend your Salesforce CLI to run Provar test cases and simplifies scratch Org testing.
releaseNotes: Provar Manager commands added to connect, display, open to Provar Manager Orgs.
Provar Manager commands added to retrieve, run, and report on test cases in Provar Manager.
Provar Manager commands added to upload code coverage and code quality reports directly to Provar Manager.

plugins.description: This Jenkins plugin lets you set up and configure an environment to run Provar Automation tests with limited manual effort.
releaseNotes: Removed JDK 8 from build path in Jenkinsfile
Updated Jenkins BOM and Jenkins minimum version
